SEARCH
Package cop4331.client

Class Cart

java.lang.Object
cop4331.client.Cart
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<LineItem>
public class Cart extends Object implements Iterable<LineItem>
The Cart class represents a shopping cart that contains line items and notifies observers of changes.

    • setItems

      public void setItems(List<LineItem> items)
      Sets the list of line items in the cart and notifies observers. Also updates the total cost and empty status.
      Parameters:
      items - the new list of line items

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Product product, int qty)
      Adds a line item to the cart and notifies observers. Also updates the total cost and empty status.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to add
      qty - the quantity of the product

    • removeItem

      Parameters:
      product - the product to remove

      Clears all items from the cart and notifies observers.

      Checks if the cart is empty.

    • calculateTotal

      public void calculateTotal()
      Recalculates the total cost based on the items in the cart. Also updates the empty status.
